item.title: WATCH: Trump directs Pam Bondi to unseal grand jury transcripts related to Epstein case
item.description: President Donald Trump has directed Attorney General Pam Bondi to unseal grand jury transcripts related to the Jeffrey Epstein case.

item.title: Trump claims Epstein files are faked, but many documents have been public for years
item.description: Trump alleged, without evidence, that former Biden officials doctored the files.
